synopsis.text:
Due to a mission to apprehend a mischievous mage, members of the Fairy Tail guild, including Natsu, Lucy, and Happy, find themselves separated in an unfamiliar town. Coincidentally, Haru and Elie from the Rave Master series are also separated in the same town. In a twist of fate, Lucy and Elie cross paths, while Natsu, suffering from motion sickness, encounters Haru.

As the plot thickens, Elie's friendly demeanor is questioned when she matches the description of the mage the Fairy Tail members are searching for. Natsu's suspicions grow when he learns of Haru's connection with Elie, leading to misunderstandings and a heated confrontation between the two groups.

This thrilling crossover between the beloved Fairy Tail and Rave Master series follows the journey of these iconic characters as they navigate through their differences and discover shared commonalities. As the tension rises and miscommunications escalate, they must set aside their differences and unite against a mutual enemy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
